title: Trouble in town
creator_credit: Kevin Murray and Bairnsdale Technical School
brief_description: Under the supervision of Kevin Murray, 1st year Diploma students participated in a film exercise as part of their film appreciation classes. Their theme for practical study was the “classic chase” of the goodies after the baddies. This is a silent film.
